SELECT c.contract_no , c.emp_no , c.template_seq , c.doc_status , c.process_status , c.signature_data_no , c.validation , c.agree_yn , c.del_yn , c.created_by , c.created_at , c.updated_by , c.updated_at , ct.template_title , c.name , ctd.contract_title_en , c.dept_code from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where c.del_yn = 'N'
order by c.created_at desc LIMIT #{paging.displayRow} OFFSET #{paging.offset}
SELECT COUNT(c.CONTRACT_NO) FROM CONTRACTS C JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE CT ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CT.TEMPLATE_SEQ JOIN USERS U ON C.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO where C.del_yn = 'N'

SELECT c.contract_no , c.emp_no , c.template_seq , c.doc_status , c.process_status , c.signature_data_no , c.validation , c.agree_yn , c.del_yn , c.created_by , c.created_at , c.updated_by , c.updated_at , ct.template_title , c.name , c.sign_date , ctd.contract_title_en , c.dept_code , c.reject_reason , date_format(c.assigned_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as assigned_at , c.assigned_by from contracts c join contract_template ct on c.template_seq = ct.template_seq join contract_template_details ctd on ct.template_seq = ctd.template_seq where c.contract_no = #{seq}
